scripts.dev: yarn dlx prisma generate && yarn dlx tsc && yarn node dist/Entrypoint.js
scripts.start:docker: docker run --detach --name DiscordBot --network bridge --restart unless-stopped bot:latest
scripts.dev:docker: docker build --tag bot:latest . && docker run --detach --name DiscordBot --network bridge --restart unless-stopped bot:latest
scripts.stop:docker: docker stop DiscordBot && docker rm DiscordBot && docker rmi bot:latest
